hadith.text: It was narrated that from 'Ata' bin As-Sa'ib, from Ash-Sha'bi who said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] cursed the one who consumes Riba, the one who pays it, the one who witnesses it and the one who writes it down; the woman who does tattoos and the woman who has that done; and forbade wailing (in mourning), but he did not say that its doer is cursed
